mapper.insert: insert into st_product_record( user_record_id, area_id, user_id, product_id, order_fee, order_num, supplier_id, accept_date ) values ( #{userRecordId}, #{areaId}, #{userId}, #{productId}, #{orderFee}, #{orderNum}, #{supplierId}, now() )
mapper.select: select record_number as recordNumber, user_record_id as userRecordId, area_id as areaId, user_id as userId, product_id as productId, order_fee as orderFee, order_num as orderNum, supplier_id as supplierId, accept_date as acceptDate from st_product_record where user_record_id = #{userRecordId}
